feed.title: NocoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.257.0 : All NocoDB Bases are just Postgres!
entry.content:
🥁 🥁 🥁 🥁

We’re excited to announce several powerful new features in this release, designed to enhance your data management experience with NocoDB!

👉 Demo Video : https://youtu.be/QbYnyITi1hE

🗄️🔄 True Data Reflection 🎉

A Revolutionary No-Code Data Architecture

True Data Reflection introduces a breakthrough in no-code data management, enhancing your enterprise's data agility. With this feature, what you see in NocoDB’s UI is exactly what’s stored in your Postgres database—no middle layers, no discrepancies. Every NocoDB base now directly translates into a Postgres schema, keeping tables and columns perfectly aligned.

Why True Data Reflection?

In earlier versions, all bases in self-hosted NocoDB lived within the 'public' schema, which wasn’t ideal for seamless integration with BI tools or internal systems. This new feature fixes that by giving each base its own dedicated schema in PostgreSQL, simplifying system architecture and enabling transparent SQL access.

Key Benefits:
- 🔗 Unified Connectivity: Connect directly with tools like Metabase, Tableau, Retool, and more.
- ⏩ Instant Data Replication: Sync data effortlessly across systems and scale efficiently using PostgreSQL.
- 👁️ Full Transparency: View and manage your data in real time, right from your database.

📝⚙️ Conditional Fields in Form View 🎉

Create dynamic forms with ease using the new Conditional Fields feature! Now, you can display or hide form fields based on user inputs, creating a more personalized and efficient data entry experience.

📰 📢 Product Feed 🎉

Stay up-to-date with all things NocoDB! The new What’s New button on the dashboard gives you easy access to:
- :octocat: The latest GitHub releases
- :arrow_forward: YouTube tutorials
- 🐦 Recent updates on Twitter

Now, you can keep track of all new developments in one place!

We hope these updates make a big impact on your workflow. Try them out, and let us know how they’re helping you in the comments. Happy building with NocoDB!

Team NocoDB

🐛 Closed Issues

  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Updating a record with slash (/) in the primary key throws "Cannot PATCH" error #9615
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Field "Show On Conditions" missing #9602
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: skip confirmation modal for duplicate view #9576
  • [🔦 Type: Feature][👋 For : Community or Good First Issue][🎃 For : Hacktoberfest] 🔦 Feature: column filter I18n #9574
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][👋 For : Community or Good First Issue][🎃 For : Hacktoberfest] 🐛 Bug: "Redirect to URL" setting does not work in a Form View #9571
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Fields when added from multi field editor on grid are also added to form #9559
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: noco.sh generates invalid docker-compose.yml file #9533
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Field in Table disappeared #9524
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Audit log not visible for MySQL connection #9521
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Prevent keyboard shortcuts if user is in cell edit mode (keyboard shortcut collision with special characters). #9512
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: nocodb form browser tabs redirect after opening nocodb in a second tab #9501
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: Decimal column type does not respect 'preciscion' setting from GUI #9461
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: REST APIs display pageSize: 10 if limit<10 #9451
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: migration that generates thumbnails fails with external storage providers #9450
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Unable to resolve pg container name in coolify #9449
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: external mysql database the sum withing grouping stops being counted #9446
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: API does not adhere to 'limit' parameter if 'limit' of results per page is less than 10. #9445
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Missing default value for "sum" rollup #9437
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Empty required field in forms #9429
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: In GUI Number Numeric column shows up with the wrong type indicator icon #9423
  • [closed] ​ #9410
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Invalid date on postgresql DB "date" field #9409
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Create records in bulk #9407
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Webhook on condition for user field with operator 'Contains all of' has an issue #9398
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] Build Commands: Potential Issue with Script Execution #9394
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: docker compose version deprecated in github and docs examples #9392
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] can't reset password #9389
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: No Super-Admin available #9386
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: (airtable feature) keyboard shortcut for today's date #9372
  • [closed] how to query pg with sslmode=require #9371
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Support For Other DBMSs #9344
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Postgres test connection succeed even though no database exist #9257
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Unable to add TLS-encrypted external data source (PostgreSQL) in NocoDB v0.251.3+ #9098
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: when creating views, having the hability to always see column headers when scrolling vertically #9018
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Docker-Upgrade to 0.251.1 causes trouble again #8922
  • [👋 For : Community or Good First Issue] 🐛 Bug: Installation using windows executable and postgres-db does not work #8350
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Improve object storage provider configuration #7903
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Some of Auth APIs missing in v2 documentation #7730
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Form View fields based on conditional logic #4404

What's Changed

  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9383

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.257.2: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
🐛 Closed Issues

  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: NC_DB env nolonger support MySQL server ??? #9658
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Failed to decrypt any source or integration. Please configure correct encryption key. #9653
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Set Date default value to today #9644
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Pin datasheets as favorites for quick access #9635
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: conditional fields, show field alias if configured instead of actual field name #9611
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Open .doc format is not working. #9495
  • [closed] Adding Elestio as deployment option #9481
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Meta API for get all bases with 403 response #9444
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Form description revert to original after a while (Duplicate) #9340
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🔦 Feature: the calculated items in the footer automatically calculated #9331
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Link URLs are sometimes not working - link takes me to a different view #9202
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Use AWS instance/container IAM profiles for S3 access #6819
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Deleting a table/project with attachment columns doesn't delete them on filesystem #5919
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: API - Delete Attachment #5152
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: import data from excel or csv ,the header changed #4841
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Trigger selected webhooks for selected rows manually #3868
  • [🔦 Type: Feature][☎ Scope : API] Fields toggle API input should be an array #2194

What's Changed

  • Release 0.257.0 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9625
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9626
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9627
  • fix: language support for kn, ml by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9628
  • chore: Upstall script test file path correction by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9617
  • test: fix upstall bats tests by @sinanmohd in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9632
  • refactor: pnpm by @wingkwong in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9605
  • fix(nc-gui): conditional fields, show field alias if configured instead of actual field name by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9640
  • Nc fix/view download option by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9643
  • feat: poll notifications from single tab by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9613
  • Chore/timely docker build by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9645
  • Add service Label to NocoDB image for compatibility with Kamal by @tuladhar in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9631
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9646
  • Nc include cloud release by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9647
  • Nc cloud/changelog by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9629
  • Added one-click deploy template for RepoCloud.io by @cosark in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/7412
  • chore: Optimize timely docker build time by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9648
  • enhancement: increase file size limit to 25MB in QuickImport.vue (ref: #5858) by @AthrunAshy in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9654
  • feat: Added Elestio as one-click deploy option by @kaiwalyakoparkar in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9482
  • AWS IAM Role support by @Upgreydd in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9642
  • Nc fix: kanban view issues by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9649

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.258.0 : Infinite scroll
entry.content:
We’re excited to introduce Infinite Scroll in NocoDB! This new feature lets you seamlessly scroll through your records without needing to click through pages. As you scroll, additional records load automatically, making it easier and faster to browse large datasets. Enjoy a smoother, more efficient experience with Infinite Scroll in NocoDB!

Demo video : https://youtu.be/gbAJApMkHRc

Other updates

Auto Row Expansion for Bulk Paste

With the new Auto Row Expansion feature, NocoDB now automatically creates new rows when you paste multiple records from a CSV. This allows you to paste large sets of data without pre-creating rows, saving you time and reducing manual effort.

Feature Preview

Enable or disable experimental features with ease, allowing you to explore and evaluate upcoming functionalities.

Closed issues

  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Link field error if table name is lengthy #9760
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: minio: Invalid endPoint if https is included such as in https://minio-api.some.domain #9757
  • [closed] Bug: Cannot reset password. Always "Password reset successful!" #9751
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: No "equal to" option in AND conditional statements #9745
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] Bug：After dragging the record to a different date, the date display on the right is not updated. #9732
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Can't sync external database (Postgres 17) #9728
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Prefill form is not working if field name contains ? at the end e.g., field name = age ? #9719
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: NotFoundError: Failed to execute 'insertBefore' on 'Node': The node before which the new node is to be inserted is not a child of this node. #9713
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: GCS does not work with uniform bucket-level access #9712
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Error when enabling Locked mode in Form view #9710
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: API documentation missing an entry in "Request Body schema" #9702
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: self hosted, data-api slow performance on linking records #9692
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Record not found error when id contains 3 or more consecutive underscores #9679
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][🔴 Priority : Critical] 🐛 Bug: Updating description of LTAR/Links column breaking column meta #9677
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Calendar current time cursor is in the wrong place #9558
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][🔎 Status: More Info Needed] 🐛 Bug: Search doesn't find entry but filter does #9514
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: One-To-One Link Field - Cannot Search #9439
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Support for @mentions in Text fields #9102
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] 🐛 Bug: No belongs-to column for link to same table #8958
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Form enhancements/bugs #7235
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Comments added through API TOKEN request cannot be displayed, but are displayed normally through JWT TOKEN #7132
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Infinite Scroll on table #3568

What's Changed

  • Release 0.257.2 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9670
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9671

  • Nc fix/meta sync issue(cloud) by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9664
  • docs: move providers to other installation methods by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9656

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.258.2: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
🐛 Closed Issues

  • [✨ Type: Enhancement] Change button text to "Update Connection" (from "Modify Connection") #9841
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Invalid Date error format in calendar view #9808
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Cannot reset password. Always "Password reset successful!" #9752
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: l.base.duplicateShared is not a function when click copy base button on share base view #9675
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Application crashes when concatenating date intervals using & operator in Excel. #9650
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: CSV import doesn't care for duplicated field names #9572
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] Shared base with Editor access to be deprecated #9414
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Formula - Allow easier way to check if a cell is empty #9346
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🐛 Bug: Session time's out abruptly (before refresh token expiry) #9311

What's Changed

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.258.3: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
🐛 Closed Issues

  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Multi select content vanishing on page turn #9902
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][🏗️ Type: In Develop Branch] 🐛 Bug: can't upload csv to table with checkbox field #9891
  • [🐛 Type: Bug][🏗️ Status: In Resolution] 🐛 Bug: Cannot use s3 ovh plugin, error: "cannot read property of undefined (reading builder)" #9890
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Date Format #9869
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Form validation is failing if field name includes [] square brackets #9856
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Can't paste in search box for linked table #9846
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Duplicate Storage Providers in Setup Page #9828
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: webhook is not working with External Source DB #9787
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] 🔦 Feature: Date Range field type and show on Calendar #9785
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: One-To-One Link Field - Cannot Search #9439
  • [🐛 Type: Bug] 🐛 Bug: Issue with last record while paginating #9376
  • [closed] 🐛 Bug: Initial invitation e-mail is sent twice #8460
  • [closed] 🔦 Feature: Personal view or how to how to allocate work space. #6252
  • [🔦 Type: Feature] [Feature] Rollback the database changes to certain time or tag #2077

What's Changed

  • Release 0.258.2 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9854
